website_summaries.verdict: A great general-purpose door mirror with a great deal of vertical height and viewability in the design. Top contender for anyone wanting a simple product.
pros: Full-length design provides a great vertical view of the user
The provided clamps will fit over any standard door in seconds
cons: Narrow mirror profile makes it difficult to see the whole body all at once

customer_reviews.title: 2 Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that the mirror would come damaged or shattered, like in some negative reviews. However, the mirror came perfectly intact! I ordered the white mirror on 8/13/18 and the hooks are a matching white. Overall this is exactly what I was looking for and I am happy with the purchase – especially for the price as I was surprised that most full length mirrors run over $100. This is great for people not looking to spend that much money and need something simple that saves space. Easy installation and you can screw the hooks in so the mirror can be higher or lower. It was delivered via USPS and the box does say something like: caution glass inside.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: smart choice for limited space apartments
customer_reviews.text: What a smart product for small homes that don't have space to place a standing mirror in their bedrooms. Have hung this behind our bedroom door and it's great. Super easy to install and hang. I used it a lot during the pregnancy to keep track of the belly growth :) The only thing i don't like is that the door makes noise everytime we close it fully now which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Vishal Kapoor

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Mirror has no distortion. It hangs over my bedroom door. The metal hangers are white, which is good, because the door is white. Large enough for a full figure view, feet to top of head. Seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: June J.

customer_reviews.title: Distorted
customer_reviews.text: Shame, I had to change this from a 5 star rating to what it is now. The mirror looks nice and was easy to hang, when I stand close the reflection is very crisp and clear. But when I stand back there is noticeable distortion. Bob my body up and down and you can see it ripples like a fun house mirror. It's a shame because it completely defeats the purpose of a full body mirror if you have to stand inches away to get a non distorted reflection.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! Very secure and well packaged. Comes with over the door hangers and a set of screws/anchors to directly place on the wall so you can have a choice on how to use. I chose the over the door style - you can choose to place the screws in the brackets at 3 different places to find the right height for you. Seems very sturdy on the door. Best of all, it was made here in the United States! I was hesitant to buy online since I had one previously that was very flimsy and fell off and broke. I am very impressed and would recommended this to everyone. Looks great too
customer_reviews.author: hollyb28

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice mirror and the frame is constructed very well
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice mirror and the frame is constructed very well,too. The hanging hooks didn't fit with my door frame so i used the wall mounts instead and attached it to my bathroom door. The mirror banged a little when I opened or closed the door so i secured the back with mounting tape.
customer_reviews.author: John Reoli

customer_reviews.title: Distorted glass, hangs crooked
customer_reviews.text: Mirror arrived quickly and safely packaged. It's easy to attach the hooks for hanging over a door but the predrilled holes are crooked so the hooks attach crooked so the mirror hangs slightly crooked. I could deal with this or probably fix this if I bothered but the mirror image is seriously distorted. I installed it down the hall and it's frightening to approach because my body looks so distorted. I can't bear to look at it, honestly. To be fair, when you're up close, you don't notice the distortion so much, but I specifically bought the full length mirror so I could view my full length. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee Morra

customer_reviews.title: Careful using included hardware!
customer_reviews.text: Mirror arrived with a few scratches on the wood trim. This wasn't a huge deal for me personally, since I have furniture repair markers that did a pretty good job at covering them up (they should've included one with the product though). The main issue I encountered was with the included hardware. The provided screws went right through the front! They should've been about 1/8" shorter. The only other hardware provided are drywall anchors and screws for mounting to a wall, so I know that the "correct" screws were used. Extremely poor quality control. Very disappointed since this was supposed to be a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use the provided drilling template!
customer_reviews.text: So I’ll start with the positive. The mirror was packed very nicely. The mirror glass itself is also good quality. The frame however is very cheap and poorly assembled. Mine has yellow staining from what I assume is glue. The holes on the back for hanging are also poorly machined and I had to clear away debris from the slots where the screws slide in. Finally the guide template for drilling the holes were at least 1/4” off. Ridiculous that they didn’t get that right or more likely the hole placement on the mirror itself was off. Either way terrible quality control and poor overall value.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Hoglund

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The mirror has a long deep scratch from the right side under the frame across the middle. Will return. ** Update: We ordered another mirror and while it was not scratched we realized the 1st mirror must have been a return shipped out to us upon our order. The 1st one was packaged differently, lots of tape and staples. The 2nd mirror has white hangers, not silver ones which look easy better hanging on a white door.
customer_reviews.author: MariannAZ

customer_reviews.title: Like those "fun house" mirrors
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is a complete waste of money. The top part of the mirror makes everything looks long and the middle part squeezes everything. Shocking that Amazon sells a low quality product like this!
customer_reviews.author: A-customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to be blown away
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This is the cheapest mirror of this size I could find, and it shows. The frame is very cheap and arrived with one corner dented in. The mirror had some gunk on it that may or may not clean off... we'll see. The mounting brackets stick up above the frame which isn't very clean looking. But it's a great size and I don't have distortion issues that others have mentioned. It's definitely more practical than pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: D. Yager III

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was shipped in a thin, flimsy box that was badly damaged. When I opened it, the frame of the mirror was in pieces and not connected anymore. It is cheaply make and NOT worth the money. Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby...
customer_reviews.text: After reading a few reviews of this product I nervously purchased anyway... The pro.'s about his mirror are that it doesn't have a warped look when you look at your or other reflections (like some do), it is convenient to have around, it is easy to install and it isn't overly priced. The cons.'s about his mirror are that the seam corners do not exactly 'come together' like you would expect, the backing is of compressed cardboard (or something of) and it is too difficult to return (hence the 3 rating - I would like to give it a 3.5, but that isn't possible).
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I was genuinely  embarrassed to be an american when I saw that it was made in America.
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY THIS. This product is cheaply and poorly made. The entire thing was dirty when I took it out of the box and the mirror itself already had permanent scratches on it. The holes that are drilled in the back (for the end user to attach the hangars with) are not lined up with the frame of the mirror properly. The holes not being lined up caused the screw to screw in at an angle and now the side of the hangar can be seen from the front of the mirror. Really disappointed I wasted my money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Chapin

customer_reviews.title: Imperfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble the two door hooks, but there are several imperfections in the glass of the mirror and the wood surrounding the mirror. These imperfections are small, but annoying and certainly shouldn’t be found on a brand new mirror! I am considering returning the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: msj

customer_reviews.title: Better off going to Dollar General
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. The pre-drilled holes to put the over door hangers on were completely crooked so if I were to hang it over the door it would hang crooked. However I was not even able to hang it over the door because I have standard doors in my home and the door hanger was much too narrow to fit over my door. If it wasn't so difficult to put it back in the box and bring it to be returned I would be requesting a full refund on this item. I could have gotten a better one at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: lori zito

customer_reviews.title: This mirror arrived shattered and I’m so disappointed. Upon looking at other reviews
customer_reviews.text: This mirror arrived shattered and I’m so disappointed. Upon looking at other reviews, it seems like a common problem. I have the mirror 2 stars instead of 1 because other than being shattered and unusable as a result, it seems like a nice mirror. I wish I could use it but I’m having to return it and won’t be ordering a replacement due to the concern that it will just happen again.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA G SOHL

customer_reviews.title: Does what It's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our small guest bath. I wanted something inexpensive, would show full body, a frame that matched the decor yet was not a hunk of junk. I've been shopping for a full length mirror for awhile and the quality is generally poor at a pretty high price, this one is the opposite. It's acceptable quality and a reasonable price, the adjustable rack fits over the door and the door is still actually able to close properly! We did have to add some thick double sided tape to the back of the mirror to keep it from "flopping around" when the door is opened or closed. Other that that, it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Kim K

customer_reviews.title: Well made and more attractive than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much and frankly just expected to get a $7 mirror with $30 worth of packaging to survive delivery. Instead, its a legitimately nice genuine wood frame with a nice finish and grain, and ostensibly well made. Has two holes discreetly drilled in frame back for secure mounting. So I am happy to report this is better than just a flimsy discount dorm-room door mirror that you find in a box of shards at Walmart; this is a legitimately attractive and well made mirror.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Distortion free real glass mirror
customer_reviews.text: A very high quality mirror at a fair price, and made in America to boot! Distortion free, nicely framed in real wood, and easy to hang. I nicked one star off the rating because, as a professional quality inspector, I am offended that their inspector uses glue on the parts bag that eats plastic, allowing one of the sharp screws to rattle around free in the box. No damage to this one, but a bad habit.
customer_reviews.author: Harleyelf

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality finish on edge. The simulated wood is really just a paper wrap and arrived already peeling. The pilot holes on back didn't line up so it hangs crookedly. Was hoping to hang permanently on wall, but the overall look and quality was so poor, I decided the hang behind door in guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mathieu

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and I didn't want to put holes in the wall and since I have a coat closet next to my front door this was a perfect solution to check my look before I go out the door. It is sturdy and made of good quality and has a decent mirror that isn't warped. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sherril ✌️💕🌞

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice just buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love it I love it I absolutely love it and the best part about it is that when it hangs even though it's not angle towards the floor I can still see my feet I absolutely loved it couldn't be happier. I went through so many different vendors looking for 1 one that sat on the floor so I could tilt it to see my feet but I don't have to do that with this just do it trust me buy it it's worth it it looks nice it looks like it cost more than what you paid for trust me I am thinking about painting The Hangover Clips White that's just me though
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I put this in the coat closet by my front door. The mirror hangs close to the door but I used 2 Command picture hanging strips to make sure the bottom of the mirror stays attached and does not move when the door is opened or closed. It works great. I got white which blends well with my white closet door. Even though it's an over-the-door bracket, it's not too noticeable which is nice because it is in my entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Bucky

customer_reviews.title: Shipped broken twice. Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Wow I don’t usually write reviews but this mirror has gotten to my place broken, TWICE. The first time it came shattered, and the second time it came with a scratch over the part of the mirror that reflects my face. At this point I don’t even want another replacement. I’m in NY so I have to spend money on an uber to get to the UPS stop or carry it through the subway, and that’s a pain in the ass. Don’t buy this, it’s a headache.
customer_reviews.author: William L.

customer_reviews.title: It arrived looking like it was a used item, or one that was on display for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was smudged with what must have been a dirty or oily rag. It also has a scratch in the mirror. The back of the mirror had sawdust across it and soiled area. The hanging bracket pre-drilled holes do not line up with the bracket. Once the bracket is screwed into the holes it sticks out from the side. Yes, I had the option to return it BUT I really needed it for a handicapped person to use immediately. Very disappointed in this mirror. I still believe this was not a new item of which I paid for. Not worth the money. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Chetta

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to "hang" the mirror with....?
customer_reviews.text: The mirror didn't come with anything with which to hang it over the door. Normally these come with some kind of hanging mechanism. So yeah. Not really a door-hanging mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Trish P.

customer_reviews.title: What you would expect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with this mirror is that it came with two deep scratches on the mirror surface; one in the middle top and one in the middle half way down so it looks dirty. I did not have the issues with the screws going all the way through the wood as many other people have. For the price, its not a bad purchase. I just wish it didn’t have the imperfections. It was very simple to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Wall Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Pros...packed so well that it's difficult to remove, pre-drilled holes for a wall mount, nice frame color when hung, but question its price, no distortion in glass from different distances Cons...frame separates from glass if trying to remove from box with one hand, a substance that may be dried glue can be seen on frame next to the glass, tops of wall mount brackets & heads of screws are visible above mirror frame, stain pen was necessary to fill in corners where pieces of frame meet
customer_reviews.author: Linda H. Blalock

customer_reviews.title: Price only worth it if you manage to hang it
customer_reviews.text: The holes used to fasten the hangers to the mirror were not deep enough for the screws, so I had to drill them in. Then I found that the mirror did not fit over my door despite having a standard sized door. I now have the mirror on the floor, but there are definitely higher quality floor mirrors for half the price of this one on Amazon. Before buying, you should ensure that you have a drill and that the hangers will fit over your door frame. Otherwise, I would suggest buying a different mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Keelin Shaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow and poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. This mirror is barely 10 inches wide. what a "Made In America" joke! You can get a bigger one for half the price at the local Target.The frame takes up another 2. The holes in back are uneven,, one side is so close to edge the hanging piece shows beyond the mirror. When its hung over the door the bottom flaps every time the door is opened so it has to be taped down. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: DMitten

customer_reviews.title: Fell Off Door
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the sturdiest mirror out there. I nudged it while exiting my bathroom and it fell off the door and shattered glass was everywhere. I acknowledge I could have mounted it better with screws, however, a consumer should feel more confident in a mirror that was meant to simply hang over the door.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Emil Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Decent mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirror arrived with some "stuff" on the glass, but I was able to take a razor blade and scrape it clean. Once I had all the hard to remove stuff scrapped off, I had to give it a good clean with some glass cleaner. The rest of the mirror seemed to arrive in good shape, which is cool. And like most others mentioned, some good two sided sticky tape of some sort is really nice to keep the mirror from swinging out away from the door when people use the door. Not too shabby for the price, but could be a little more sturdy/solid.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tipton

customer_reviews.title: the TEMPLATE does NOT fit
customer_reviews.text: The product self is fine. It's a mirror and looks and works like how you would expect it to be. The reason I'm giving it two stars is because the wall mounting instructions came with a paper template to help you drill the holes, but the template's measurements are off by half an inch or so. I didn't realize it until after I drilled the holes and tried to mount the mirror... If you are mounting it on a wall, throw away the piece of trash template and use a tape measure instead.
customer_reviews.author: Hongtai Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Took less than 5 minutes to unpack, put the brackets on, and hang it on my door. All I needed was a screwdriver, everything else is included. My door is 1.5 inches thick and fits perfectly. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality, easy to hang, nice looking
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a quality looking mirror. You can view your entire body, and the cherry frame is especially nice looking. However, as it has a frame, I couldn't find any clips deep enough to mount it to the bedroom door, so I ended up just using the included hardware to hang it over the door, and found Velcro works great to secure the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Extra Long Mirror to the Rescue
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the back of my bedroom door! I've been looking high and low for an extra long door mirror and this one matches my bedroom set to a tee. Extremely satisfied with this product. Only minor critique is that when opening and closing the door, the mirror tends to slam against the door. I'm sure I can Macgyver a solution eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: product arrived with a hairline fracture in mirror. I did not notice this until after I put the box in the recycle bin, by then it was gone, so I am unable to return it.
customer_reviews.author: charles aughenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR QUALITY ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY DISAPPOINTED with the quality of this item. I definitely paid WAY TOO MUCH Money for this mirror. I probably could of gotten a better quality item at a dollar general store. The pre-drilled holes to hang the mirror are crooked so when you screw the hooks in then hang the mirror it's crooked.
customer_reviews.author: toni

customer_reviews.title: Warning: does not reflect vamires.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it arrived today. Bought the cherry finish. It looks amazing and installation was a snap. It performs exactly as promised by clearly reflecting nearly everything that is placed in front of it. For some reason it will not reflect my ex wife when she stands in front of it. I guess that is just verification that she is a blood sucking demon of hell. Who knew.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Easy instructions, good mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is well-made (the image isn't wavy), the mirror fits sturdy on the door, it looks good and is easy to install. This mirror perfectly matched my expectations. I also really appreciated that the instructions are very easy to understand, whether you want to hook the mirror to your door or screw it into your wall. If hooking this to a door you'll probably need earthquake putty to prevent the bottom of the mirror from flapping when you open/close the door.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is glass, not some wavy reflective surface like some others. I'm only writing this review to mention that my door hooks were black (as pictured) instead of white (as some reviewers received). I was hoping they'd be white to blend in with the door, guess I could paint them. Otherwise the mirror arrived in good condition without any damage, which was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Stains on glass
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy enough, but there are unremovable stains on the mirror. The stains are faint squiggly lines that are visible toward the top, covering a fourth of the mirror. For the price, it should be a fairly good quality piece. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cheap not inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: So I assumed (bad me) for the price that this was made from actual wood not some kind of cheap pressed fiber. It arrived in a perfect box yet somehow had a few deep scars on the frame. If I hadn't ordered it so late I would have returned it but it was a Christmas gift. :( I should have stuck with plan A and hit Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Downs

customer_reviews.title: Received a used, damaged mirror that the seller tried to pass off as new.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally do this, but I cannot let this go. I just received this mirror that I presumed was brand new, as that was one of my search requirements when looking for it. If you look closely at the picture, you can see the pre-cut holes for hanging the mirror are clearly damaged, and to the side of both of those holes are holes added by either nails or screws where someone who previously owned this mirror tried to hang it. You can also see sloppy paint in the top corners. Someone obviously returned this mirror and the seller tried to pass it off to me as a new mirror. Even the label is peeling off! Shameful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Classy & Clean Storage
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. All my jewelry is neatly organized, I love the LED lights and the lock & key. I stuffed mine a little with chunky necklaces but the lock & key ensures the door stays closed. Mine is hung behind my door but they included a velcro strip so the jewelry organizer doesn't move when you open or close the door, and it works great! Easy to assemble, I was able to do it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Zen

customer_reviews.title: The mirror arrived in good condition but one of the holes to insert the ...
customer_reviews.text: The mirror arrived in good condition but one of the holes to insert the nail for the metal bar is not properly aligned. I put the nail and it seems to hold but I don't know for how long. I didn't think it was worth going to the trouble of returning the mirror and trying to repackage it but I was not impressed. They should have made sure that the holes were properly aligned. I'll wait and see how it goes. Hopefully the nail holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Soph

customer_reviews.title: Mirror arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The mirror arrived quickly, and it was easy to attach the over-the-door hooks which was great; but once I hung it up, I noticed that the entire front of the mirror was damaged. Multiple fine scratches are all over the mirror, and there are some small scuffs on the glass at the top. I tried to clean it thinking it was just dust, but no - definitely scratches. I don't believe it's from shipping as the mirror was packaged very securely, so it's probably from the factory. The mirror is still useable, but doesn't look great... only gets 2 stars because of the fast shipping and easy assembly, but I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: M adler

customer_reviews.title: Quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: Great that it was made in USA However expected the frame to be better quality and there was few areas of glue between mirror and frame coming out. And unfortunately the holes for the screws were not even.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Came in a box that was stapled and glued to tightly you had to slice it open with a knife on three sides with no way to know if you were damaging the mirror or not. Cracks on the side a bit when you screw in the hangers because the pilot holes that come pre drilled aren't deep enough. Packed with a nasty sticky film int he cimter of the mirror that not only doesn't cover the whole thing, but also leaves a nasty residue when you take it off. Won't get clean with glass cleaner or microfiber cloths. I wouldn't buy it again if it was free.
customer_reviews.author: David Love

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed in the hanging kit that came with the mirror. I ordered one and the screws were way too long and came out of the front of the mirror. So I returned it and ordered another one. I was very careful but again the screws were too long. Even just half way in they completely split the front of the mirror. I tried using smaller screws but they couldn’t support the weight. Something is terribly wrong if not one but 2 are having this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sursa

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and how easy it is to put together. What I found disappointing is the first time I ordered this, the glass was scratched in 2 places so I reordered. The second time I received the item the frame was scratched. For how much it cost, the mirror should have been in perfect condition. I would not recommend because of the continued hassle and you having to drop it off at ups since amazon said they would charge to have it picked up.
customer_reviews.author: Girlie

customer_reviews.title: came shattered
customer_reviews.text: came properly packaged but shattered. looked like it would've been nice though and they didn't give any trouble with the refund
customer_reviews.author: Savannah B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality though
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had rubber bumpers on back to prevent clacking against door. Good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Arrived broken!
customer_reviews.text: Both the box and mirror were damaged. It’s too heavy for me to carry to the UPS store to return and I don’t have a car. So now I’m not getting a refund on a broken mirror. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: ROSANNA HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can hang this on a door and I think it looks good. I should have personally gotten a white one but did not want to deal with the exchange process. I had had some issues with the mirror staying in the frame at the bottom. I am sure I could easily fix this with some glue and may have to at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton L. Bieschke

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Shopped around at multiple stores before deciding to pull the trigger and purchase this mirror. I was worried that it might arrived damaged or broken, but it was packaged well and had no issues. Super easy to install and looks great. I'm very happy with this purchase and glad I took the chance!
customer_reviews.author: Idgie Threadgoode

customer_reviews.title: Perfect... Crazy packaging
customer_reviews.text: The packaging for this mirror was almost laughable... But the mirror did arrive in one piece, so I can't fault the company. I recommend opening the box completely, not just the side like I did. Took us few minutes to find the screws because of where they were placed. Easy to put on the door hanger parts and pop it over the door, which still closes easily. You will need a screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: JessJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy. Everything included!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful packing job! Mirror intact, all hardware was there and easy instructions. SO easy to put together and hang. I am a senior, too! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan W

customer_reviews.title: This mirror does not disappoint. It came in perfect condition and was very ...
customer_reviews.text: This mirror does not disappoint. It came in perfect condition and was very quick and easy to assemble. It is light in weight not heavy or bulky. Fits perfectly over my standard size door. Contrary to the photo the handles attached to the mirror are white not black. Love how it makes my room look bigger. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Made well, shipped well
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy mirror with no distortion; the hooks allow for various hanging lengths and fit very nicely over my bathroom door. It was extremely well packaged so my worries about purchasing a mirror to be shipped were groundless. And for folks who want to buy American, this product was made in the good ole USA. I would definitely buy other products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: EED

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Packed for Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Ordering a mirror online is a tricky thing. Forget about the product itself, how are they going to ship this thing so that it arrives in one piece? This product is great and the company takes GREAT care in its packaging to ensure it arrives in one piece. Everything else the positive reviews say apply too. The mirror is an accurate, non-flawed reflection; it is easy to assemble, it looks as it is represented in the photos. The hanging hardware for the oak mirror is white.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, needs to be secured in the middle
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Mirror, no complaints on that. Once attached / hooked to the door, opening and closing can cause the actual mirror to bounce. Not enough to cause / make you think "oh man my mirror is gonna break" , just gets a tad annoying. Need to secure with some double sided tape or if you don't holes in your door , just brace it with brackets / just tape to the door.
customer_reviews.author: Better_Call_Morty

customer_reviews.title: Other than those reason I really loved the mirror
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival the tape used to secure the foam padding stuck to the mirror and couldn't get it off. Also tape pulled some of the wood coating off. Other than those reason I really loved the mirror
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't sit correctly on the door. But I think that has more to do with the design of the door. It's almost at a slight angle which can be annoying with certain clothes, but otherwise it gets the job done. No damage in delivery. Looks clean on the door. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: JCBx2

customer_reviews.title: Great looking mirror, arrived scratched
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! However, arrived with many scratches and dings on both the mirror and frame. Was able to color in the dings on the frame with a black marker, and even with the scratches on the mirror it still looks great from far away and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but a lot of work to unpack
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is gorgeous, especially for the price point. But - it was kind of hard to unpack. I understand the need to pack it well due to it being fragile- I actually appreciate that - I didn’t like the film on the mirror. After removing the film (which was difficult, took around 15 mins) there was thick sticky residue that I had to scrub (only would come off with either rubbing hard with my fingers or scrubbing hard with a microfiber towel) took a good 20-30 mins to get it all off. Otherwise I would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The mirror works as advertised. It was easy to assemble and hangs on the door easily. This item should have a "results may vary disclaimer", my daughter seems to know how to use it effectively as she virtually never steps away from it, however, every time I step in front of it I am unhappy with the results. I am still not positive that I am using it correctly, it is possible that it inadvertently adds 15 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror but some issues
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping, good quality mirror but I did have some issues. The mirror is supposed to come with 4 screws for over the foot installation but mine only came with 3. Also the mirror comes with holes to insert the screws but the holes aren’t properly done (not deep enough and don’t align perfectly with the holes on the door hangers).
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Arrived scratched to hell. Don’t waste your money. They know how bad the manufacturing is, since the inner box clearly states that their products were produced to “perfection”.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Rteil

customer_reviews.title: 13 minutes and my daughter-in-law had a nice mirror in my guest room!
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well in my small guest room. It's a good quality mirror and I only needed a screwdriver to put it together and hang it. It took about 13 minutes to put it together. (Of course, your speed with tools may vary.) I would recommend this to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It is an OK budget mirror. No picture distortion. Average/poor quality of the frame is I guess what makes the price that low. The corners arrived with imperfections (say, I ordered a white one and I can see the "inner" brown part of the frame at the corner joints, uncovered with a white paint), and the hanging system is of poor quality - the drills were made in a way that I couldn't make the two hanging parts be straight and parallel, which gives it a sloppy look). Otherwise, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Corners were not tight.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror had obviously been a return. Both ends of the box were open and the length was taped with the staples undone. Fortunately, the hardware was in a bag and was glued to the inside of the box. After I hung the mirror I saw that the mitered corners were not tight. So it was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tyna Rosewood

customer_reviews.title: Over the door Mirror not for short people...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice mirror. The only thing that I didn't take into consideration is the height of the door. Our doors are 7' tall in this house. I am 5'3", and I could hardly see myself. I only gave it 4 stars because I can't use it over the door like a wanted to, and I had to just prop it up against the wall. Not a lot of wall space, so I was disappointed. It is a good product, but measure your door first, before you order, to be sure that when you put it all up on your door that you can see yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Carole D.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, suggest making one yourself (better quality) for less money.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap $5 Wal-Mart quality mirror w/ cheap $2 hooks... I was honestly expecting far better quality when I dished out almost $50 While "Made in America" the quality is lower than "Made in China", the mirror even has a slight bend to it and the material quality is the poorest I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Bugalydosh

customer_reviews.title: Smaller and causes door to stick
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected and it would not allow the door to easily open/close. My daughter and her roommate switched to another mirror brand that the roommate had brought and it worked much better at allowing the door to open and close; so it must have something to do with the thickness of the hanger. In addition, the roommates mirror was larger.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, needs to be fastened on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good. I am happy to report that there are no defects or image distortions on the mirror. It was easy to install over the door. ONE ISSUE: The mirror kept rocking back and forth as I opened and closed the door, making thumping sounds. To fix this problem I added a small two sided sticky tape between the door and the bottom of the mirror. Now it stays put and is a lot more stable. I recommend that the manufacturer include a small strip of two sided sticky tape and instruct the user to fasten it between the mirror and the door.
customer_reviews.author: L. Divringi

customer_reviews.title: Effortless to install, & space saving
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t experience the “screws popping through the face of my mirror frame” issue that some reviewers mentioned, but I also hand-tightened mine with a non power screwdriver. I was worried about having such a fragile item shipped, but it arrived with no damage whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: The mirror is not of good quality (sometimes it reflects your image like a fun-house ...
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is not of good quality (sometimes it reflects your image like a fun-house mirror--it's very minimal though. Only at the bottom-edges of the mirror for mine), and it will come to you slightly damaged at the corners of the wood. It's easily chipped. Still, it's a better version of another mirror that I have at the moment, so I don't mind the minor issues.
customer_reviews.author: amashopit

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, but it came dirty with sawdust
customer_reviews.text: The mirror itself is fine, but when I opened in the package, there was sawdust covering the whole thing and I had to wipe it down to clean it. I think it was from them drilling the holes in the mirror frame. But after I cleaned the mirror up, it looks great hanging on my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Fox

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for ... except
customer_reviews.text: The mirror came on time, it was packaged well & it was very easy to assemble. I would have given it 5 stars except ... there were 2 long scratches on the mirror on the left hand side in the middle. Other than that, it is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Loriellen_B

customer_reviews.title: I don't like things I have to put together even a little
customer_reviews.text: You have to put the hangers for the door on it and I am not good at that type of thing, but I like the mirror. I wish the mirror were bigger though too.
customer_reviews.author: SRZ

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging and low quality
customer_reviews.text: The package was delivered in a bad condition. The whole box was dirty and it was full of sawdust inside. It could have even harm me and many loose ends has sharp edges in packaging. Due to the same the cover of mirror was damaged too. I had to properly clean the mirror surface and boundary to look like a decent product. Overall it was fine but could have been better in terms of packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Apoorv Goel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Fine for the price. Everytime I shut the door that I hang this from, it kinda flops back and smacks it. The mirror is really lightweight. Also the screws didnt line up nicely with where the holes were, so I had to kind of mess with it a bit to make it work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Grafton

customer_reviews.title: Not all pieces shipped
customer_reviews.text: Missing the hardware. No over the door hangers. Nothing to attach the mirror to the door. I will have to buy some hardware to attach the mirror to the door. Package was taped up and tore on the end.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth j figures

customer_reviews.title: Great over the door mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror! I have one upstairs and one downstairs. So easy to put together. Then just hang it on your door. To secure the bottom just use double stick tape. The mirror is packaged very good. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: L Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Turned out great!
customer_reviews.text: Package came quickly and in good condition. Excellent padding. My husband assembled it quickly. It is very sturdy and hangs well. You can customize the height of the mirror to fit the person using it. . .a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine State

customer_reviews.title: Hangers can not be adjusted!
customer_reviews.text: The mirror itself was nice, sturdy, easy to assemble, etc. However, when it came to having it over my door, the hangers wouldn't fit! My door was too thick for the hangers and they were not expandable...hence I'll have to return it. The dimensions also were not specified on the website, and when I looked online for wider hangers for thicker doors, their price was almost as much as the actual mirrors! Extremely disappointed, I was really looking forward to it...
customer_reviews.author: Malak

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror for Doors
customer_reviews.text: I placed this in my small gym behind the door. Works great. Place some double sided foam tape at the bottom and it prevents it from knocking around when you open the door. I chose the wolfs tooth design and its pretty neutral for dark coloured rooms. setting it up took 10 mins and all u need is a screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: GILDO

customer_reviews.title: just what i needed and wanted
customer_reviews.text: just what i needed to see the back of my hair after washing and to see to put curlers in my hair.went together quick,hangs well on bathroom door andis movable enough for different views.was not expensive well worth the money.would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Janice A. Linkowski

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror for the price
customer_reviews.text: Mirror arrived fine and as advertised. I wanted to hang it over a door and the attached hardware was easy to install for hanging. The only reason for not rating it a five, is that there should have been something provided to have the mirror hang flush with the wall at the bottom. There was a sizable gap hen hung and I had to use a couple of strips of velcro at the bottom, behind the mirror to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Mirror mirror on the door...
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected better quality. Works overall. We hung it on the lowest setting/notch and being able to see the exposed holes on the hangers looks cheap but the mirror itself is good. No distorted image. Serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Itsallinthename

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Gives you the option to put into the wall or hang on the door at different heights. The packaging was done well with extra care to be sure it didnt break when shipped. The mirror and fame itself are not flimsy or cheap, they are pretty sturdy. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Momma W

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: I am always going to buy US made products but was very disappointed in the hangers of this item. On one side the hanger is over the edge and the other side they look ok. Thank goodness this will be inside my closet. Too much hassle to return. The mirror itself is great- heavy duty and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Auerbach

customer_reviews.title: Used item, screws too long, etc
customer_reviews.text: Used item sent! And the screws they sent were so long they came through the front and were too big for the brackets. If you get a new unit, it seems sturdier than most.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read no tools for over the door hanging - but didn't come assembled. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is nice, but I didn't realize I would need tools for assembly for over the door hanging. In the process of moving and thought I'd just be able to hang over door out-of-box. Disappointed. Company should have made that clear. This was definitely not for hanging on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: ETW

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. This product arrived extremely dirty. It has this large stain in the center. I tried to clean it for days and I still cannot remove it. It defeats the whole purpose of the mirror. I’m extremely disappointed in the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Casani

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered was extremely warped, which we only discovered once we mounted it on the wall. I ordered a second one because I didn't want to change the mounting hardware. It was send by USPS, but it was too big for them to deliver so I had to go pick up it up, which was no easy task. The second one is also warped, but not as badly. We decided to keep because they insisted that we return the first one and it was almost impossible to get it back in the box to ship it back. The image is also distorted. I look quite a bit thinner than I am, but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has to purchase different screws to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The screws that came with the mirror we’re too long and did not work. I had to purchase smaller screws to affix hangers to mirror. No instructions, although you can figure out how to assemble. Once assembled, mirror looks good.
customer_reviews.author: calesham

product_meta.title: Mirrotek DM1448BLK Door Mirror, 14" x 48", Black
product_meta.description: Size:14" x 48"| Color:BlackThe Greenwich Collection from Mirrotek brings to your home a line of beautifully elegant over the door, full length mirrors with a timeless, contemporary style. Each mirror in the Greenwich collection is made to last a lifetime being made from a durable particle board frame with strong and sturdy metal brackets to hold the mirror on your door, meaning this piece will be a fixture in your home for years to come. The Greenwich collection is designed with a timeless, contemporary style in mind that is highlighted by the simple, yet elegant shape, and clean lines that make this mirror a welcome addition to any home. There are a variety of beautiful finish options available in the Greenwich collection. The Greenwich full length mirror measures 14"W x 1.5"D x 48"H with a weight of only 7.5lbs. to perfectly fit a variety of door spaces in your home. This piece requires no assembly. For installation, simply hang the mirror on your bedroom or closet door. This piece is proudly brought to you by Mirrotek, an American manufacturer Since 1942. We proudly manufacturer, pack & ship each of our designer products in the USA. We offer a vast selection of dressing mirrors, accessories, clocks, gifts and more. We stand behind each of our products and we know you will be completely satisfied with our home products.
feature_bullets: PERFECTLY SIZED TO FIT YOUR DOOR: The Full Length Over The Door Mirror From The Greenwich Collection Measures 14"W x 1.5"D x 48"H and Weighs Only 7.5lbs. To Perfectly Fit Over Your Bedroom or Closet Door. No Assembly Required, Just Hang Over Your Door To Install.

MADE TO LAST A LIFETIME IN YOUR HOME: The Greenwich Collection Over The Door Mirror Is Built To Last Being Made From A Durable Particle Board with Strong and Sturdy Metal Bracket To Keep This Piece In Your Home For Years To Come.

STYLISH, CONTEMPORARY DESIGN: The Greenwich Collection Is Designed To Stylistically Fit Any Bedroom With It's Simple Shape and Clean Lines That Are Timeless. This Mirror Features A Beautiful Black Finish That Makes This A Welcome Addition To Any Home.
OPTIONS TO CHOOSE FROM: The Greenwich Collection Of Over The Door Mirrors Comes In A Variety Of Finish Options Including Cherry, Oak, White, Black, Green Marble, Toile, Hounds Tooth, and Floral.

PURCHASE WITH CONFIDENCE: An American Manufacturer Since 1942. We proudly manufacturer, pack & ship each of our designer products in the USA. We stand behind each of our products and we know you will be completely satisfied with our home products.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,192 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
